text: Galina Nefyodova also written as Galina Nefedova and Galina Nefjodova (Russian: Галина Нефёдова, born 1945) is a Soviet former long track speed skater, who was active in the 1960s and 1970s. Nefyodova represented her nation twice at the World Allround Speed Skating Championships for Women. In 1968, finishing 15th overall and in 1969, finishing 9th overall. She won the bronze medal in the 1000m event at the 1970 Winter Universiade. She also competed at other international competitions. Between 1967 and 1974 she competed at eight Soviet national championships (several disciplines per year), with her best result in 1967 finishing 6th at the Soviet Allround Championships. == Records== === Personal records === ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Date of birth missing (living people) Category:Soviet female speed skaters Category:Living people Category:Universiade medalists in speed skating
title: Galina Nefyodova
